comments.comments_text: Thomas Muller (Bayern Munich) passes the ball onto Robert Lewandowski, but one of the defenders dispossesses him. The referee and one of his assistants signal for a corner kick to Bayern Munich.

comments.comments_text: Leon Goretzka (Bayern Munich) meets a perfect cross from Thomas Muller deep inside the box and controls it with a nice first touch. He produces an accurate strike into the roof of the net. It's 1:0.

comments.comments_text: This yellow card was deserved. The tackle by Martin Hinteregger (Eintracht Frankfurt) was quite harsh and Marco Fritz didn't hesitate to show him a yellow card.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: This yellow card was deserved. The tackle by [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) was quite harsh and [REFEREE] didn't hesitate to show him a yellow card.

comments.comments_text: Bayern Munich failed to take advantage of the corner as the opposition's defence was alert and averted the threat.

comments.comments_text: It looks like Leon Goretzka (Bayern Munich) saw red with that tackle. Marco Fritz won't tolerate such behaviour on the pitch and blows for a foul.

comments.comments_text: It's in the back of the net! Alphonso Davies plays it into the box, and Thomas Muller (Bayern Munich) gets on the end of the cross to put it into the back of the net. 2:0.
